column4: i have a semi hosed system, i need some help recovering, after attempting an update that failed, my restricted drivers are gone, namely the dialup modem driver is gone and now i can not do any updates or apply fixes, the modem driver needs the linux build directory to buld the driver module, but its not there, what do i do??
i have to boot to windows to connect to net and talk in here
install the packages you need from the Installation media
maybe someone else can help you with that... I've got to go
